EmailTemplate.subject: Take advantage of the NJPA Fleet Program
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!Contact.FirstName},
State, local government, educational and nonprofit agencies have unique needs. With the NJPA Wright Express Fleet Card, you get the tools you need to manage your fleet – control over fleet purchases, comprehensive reporting, and world class Customer Service. Our fleet program also offers additional specialized services for the public sector such as Tax Exemption & Reporting, and Dedicated Support Services.
Manage, track, control and save with these great benefits:
*Acceptance –at over 90% of US Retail Fuel locations *Valuable Rebates – off all monthly retail transactions charged to your account *Special Pricing –setup fees and monthly card fees waived for NJPA members *Real-Time Online Account Access – to control, manage and track fleet purchases *Tax Exemption and Reporting – for qualified fleets to significantly reduce accounting and administrative time *24/7 Customer Service – a knowledgeable representative is always available to help you and your drivers *Roadside Assistance – keep your drivers covered while they are on the road, available 24 hours a day *Fuel Site Mapping Mobile Application – helps drivers locate the lowest price fuel stations based on their current location
To learn more about how you can participate and start saving today, visit www.wrightexpress.com/njpa. Or, give me a call today.
Sincerely,
{!User.FirstName} {!User.LastName} {!User.Title} Phone: {!User.Phone}
*Actual savings may vary
